title: Trybe Futebol Clube
description: Using React, Node.js, Express & MongoDB you'll learn how to build a Full Stack MERN Application - from start to finish. The App is called Memories and it is a simple social media app that allows users to post interesting events that happened in their lives.

title: App de receitas
description: While building it you're going to learn many advanced React & JavaScript topics, as well as how to use Stripe for card transactions. On top of that, at the end of the video, you will have this unique and complex webshop app that you will be able to add to your portfolio. And trust me, e-commerce applications are impressive.
tags: React, React Hooks, API, React Router

title: Star Wars Planet Search
description: This is a code repository for the corresponding YouTube video. In this tutorial, we're going to build and deploy a React Video Chat Application using WebRTC.

title: Trybetunes
description: A partir de um arquivo de backup de marcações vindo de um aplicativo leitor de livros, a aplicação mapeia essas marcações em seus livros, podendo visualizá-las e pesquisar em seu conteúdo.

title: Bookmarks
description: A partir de um arquivo de backup de marcações vindo de um aplicativo leitor de livros, a aplicação mapeia essas marcações em seus livros, podendo visualizá-las e pesquisar em seu conteúdo.

title: Bookmarks
description: From a reader app's bookmark backup file, this app maps these bookmarks into their book's covers, making it possible to view them and search their content.
